EmailTemplate.subject: DOCTOR EVIDENCE DOC Search TRAINING INVITATION
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence Upcoming DOC Search Trainings|*
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, ou are invited to an Introductory 60-minute training on DOC Search, the Doctor Evidence advanced medical information search engine which can be used to quickly and efficiently evaluate published and publicly available medical information for any topic. Monitor and view the most up-to-date literature Monitor new trials, literature, and other sources for safety signals Set queries/signals for surveillance Understand trends in the evidence Identify research gaps Analyze most influential authors by topic-specific expertise. SCHEDULE: 14 Feb 2019 | 10-11 AM EST | 4-5 PM CET| 12 Mar 2019 | 10-11 AM EST | 4-5 PM CET|
USER FORUM (Advanced search techniques for those who have already taken a DOC Search training) : 28 Feb 2019 | 10-11 AM EST | 4-5 PM CET|
To view self-paced, online modules on DOC Search, self-enroll at https://dre.litmos.com/self-signup/. Enter the code “Sanofi” when you create your account on this sign-up page, and you will automatically be enrolled in the DOC Search course.
Please respond to this announcement with the date of the training you would like to attend. You will receive a calendar invite for the event. Please also include your title and GBU.
Kind Regards,
Kind Regards,
Nancy Morgan Vice President, Learning and Development 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 Doctor Evidence
Doctor Evidence (DRE) is a technology and research services company that finds, synthesizes and analyzes information from published sources. We will work with you--at no cost--to create deliverables such as Systematic Literature Reviews, Meta-Analyses, Landscape Analyses, Comparative Safety Assessments, and Regulatory Responses across several therapeutic areas: Cardiovascular, Diabetes, Immunology, Multiple Sclerosis, General Medicines (including Consumer Health), Vaccines and Oncology.
